name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: QA Automation Engineer
professional_summary: Utilized Node.js to build automation frameworks for API and UI testing, ensuring seamless integration with CI/CD pipelines for faster deployment cycles.
Developed and executed Cyara test cases for IVR flows, DTMF, and speech recognition, improving call routing accuracy and customer experience.
Integrated Cyara Pulse for real-time monitoring and issue analysis, reducing downtime and enhancing system reliability.
Performed functional, regression, and performance testing for voice and digital contact center channels, ensuring compliance with HIPAA and PCI standards.
Collaborated with developers and IVR/routing teams to troubleshoot and resolve complex issues, improving team efficiency and project delivery.
Implemented REST API testing using Node.js and JSON, ensuring microservice reliability and data integrity across platforms.
Used Splunk and ELK for observability, monitoring system performance and identifying bottlenecks for optimization.
Worked with Amazon Connect and Genesys to test contact center platforms, ensuring seamless customer interactions and failover mechanisms.
Applied synthetic monitoring to simulate user interactions, identifying and resolving potential issues before they impacted customers.
Debugged and scripted test cases for telephony systems, improving test coverage and reducing manual effort by automating repetitive tasks.
Maintained automation frameworks for API, UI, and telephony testing, ensuring scalability and reusability across multiple projects.
Analyzed Cyara Pulse alerts to identify root causes of issues, implementing fixes to prevent recurrence and improve system stability.
Conducted performance testing for high-volume call routing scenarios, optimizing system performance under load.
Integrated automation scripts with CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions, enabling continuous testing and faster feedback loops.
Supported cross-functional teams in resolving complex issues, fostering a collaborative environment and improving overall project outcomes.
Implemented speech recognition testing using Cyara, ensuring accurate transcription and improving customer satisfaction.
Monitored and analyzed system logs using observability tools, identifying trends and potential areas for improvement.
Documented test cases and results, ensuring traceability and compliance with industry standards and best practices.

Cloud Platforms: AWS (S3, SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, RDS, Redshift, Bedrock)
Azure (ML Studio, Data Factory, Databricks, Cosmos DB)
GCP (Big Query, Vertex AI, Cloud SQL)
